attributes.action: Put 9PM watershed on sports and casino gambling advertisements on TV
attributes.background: During all sporting events broadcasted on television we see a ton of gambling advertisements inticing us with 'new customer offers' etc. With this being shown in front of millions of minors each day, the young generation are being slowly drawn into the dangers of gambling at a young age.

rejection.details: Ofcom is the body responsible for drawing up the broadcasting code and dealing with issues about the watershed. You can find information about Ofcom and the watershed here: http://ask.ofcom.org.uk/help/television/watershed
